bill_title: provide for a general increase in the fees collected by state departments and agencies.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a general increase in the fees collected by state departments and agencies. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any fee which is charged and collected by any state department or agency is hereby increased by a factor of two and one-half percent per annum for each full year that has elapsed since the effective date of the time when the fee was implemented or last increased by statute. Section 2. The fee increases provided for in section 1 of this Act shall be calculated by the secretary of state upon information provided by the secretary of the department or the head of the agency that administers the fees.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
